Sentencas: Metallic interconnects are attractive for solid oxide fuel cells, but typically require a ceramic coating to minimize chromium volatilization and the associated cathode poisoning.
Titulo: Synergism in the design of interconnect alloy-coating combinations solid for oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Interaction between the alloy and coating can lead to performance degradation, but also provides opportunities for modifying the composition of the alloy and/or coating for improved long-term performance.
Titulo: Synergism in the design of interconnect alloy-coating combinations solid for oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This paper contains a discussion of alloy coating interactions and the use of these interactions in materials selection and design.
Titulo: Synergism in the design of interconnect alloy-coating combinations solid for oxide fuel cells
